    RegionCapacityUtility.isCapacitySufficient(TransmissionMode mode, CNetworkProperties region, long neededBandwidthInBps)

    static boolean
    RegionCapacityUtility.isCapacitySufficientDown(CNetworkProperties region, long neededBandwidthInBps)

    static boolean
    RegionCapacityUtility.isCapacitySufficientUp(CNetworkProperties region, long neededBandwidthInBps)
